phrases: We really did it right this time.
Akechi's character turned out really good.
It would be boring without Eiji and Iwase.
That is what helped us along.
This time we will definitely do it.
Even if we do not win, it is fine.
We will just start something new.
Crow in 3rd place was only 2 votes ahead of you.
That is what I meant by too bad.
We did not beat Crow, but we still passed +Natural.
We will not be canceled, right?
I said that I did not think you could beat Niizuma-kun.
You only said it to motivate us to do better.
I cannot cancel something like that.
Please continue improving Jack with PCP.
Hey, if I could be with you right now
Then I could keep my voice from fading
The goals I have set for myself seem too high to reach,
and I feel like I have lost my way
I am relying on a broken compass and hiding in someone is shadow
If we keep letting go of what we have to find something else,
then I am convinced we can never grow up
People can get tired of a collaboration pretty quickly.
PCP could only do well at the end of the series.
I was worried you might be upset by losing to them.
Actually, I am even more motivated.
Well, that is all for today.
I am going to stay here and think for a while.
Well, thanks for your hard work.
Below that it is a close battle.
Takahama-san and Fukuda-san put in a lot of effort.
We cannot let our guard down!
Let us do our best to stay ahead!
He wants to have a meeting tonight.
We have not finished the manuscript yet.
He said something about really good news for PCP.
I-it is a bit too soon for that.
An anime is what we have dreamed about!
That is the situation, so I thought you should know.
No, of course we are happy.
Crow and the others each got animes.
We are just getting a drama CD.
Because of the subject, it is pretty easy for PCP to get a drama CD.
We have only been going for six months, so this is pretty good!
We definitely want to do it.
They do not want to spoil the characters, so it will be an original story line.
Let me know if you have any requests.
Specifically for the role of Annojo Mai.
Is it okay if I name the voice actor that I want for that role?
That is exactly the kind of request I want.
The person who does the voice on the drama CD...
When we get an anime, will that person still do the voice?
Mashiro-kun, we are not discussing an anime right now.
It is a bit too early.
But if we do eventually get an anime.
As long as the drama CD does well and you do get an anime,
the chances of keeping the same voice actor are high.
It was a good idea to stop her from doing the +Natural role.
Well, who did you have in mind?
I do not think I know her.
She is a talented and dedicated voice actor!
It is going to follow the creators' wishes as closely as possible.
If I get Azuki onto the drama CD...
PCP will definitely get an anime!
I heard about a drama CD opportunity.
The creators requested you for the role.
wanted me to be Annojo Mai
I heard that Ashirogi-sensei wanted me to be Annojo Mai on the PCP drama CD.
that has a nice ring to it!
Ashirogi-sensei... that has a nice ring to it!
Ever since I started reading Ashirogi-sensei's manga, I thought so too.
Eh... PCP is getting a drama CD.
How well do you think that fits with the story?
Since we work on the manga, we want it to turn out well.
Moriya-san, you are always working on your own storyboard in your free time.
Unlike you, I want to get serialized.
We may be coworkers, but I cannot tell you that.
But it is important for other people to see it.
You are not drawing something of your own, Shiratori-kun?
But that seems like a waste.
But I do not know what to write about.
Just draw and write about something that you like!
We are about to have dinner.
Hey Shun, you should work for dad's company.
I am... not interested in cosmetics.
If you were an artist, that would be one thing.
I hardly ever see you on the way to the studio.
We used to always go together.
I am used to drawing PCP now.
Remember when we came here in middle school?
We thought we knew everything back then.
Middle schoolers are all like that.
And in the first summer of high school you kissed Kaya-chan here.
How do you know about that?
When did you dig this hole?
You are not fooling anyone, Akechi-kun.
You are taking it too far!
Maybe things are going too well.
It is been six years since we started writing for Jack.
We have a drama CD, and Azuki will be on it.
When I write, I do not run out of ideas.
Well, I have more time too.
But there are things we still need to do.
We still have not beaten Crow... or gotten an anime.
The final script for the drama CD is finished.
He is got the characters down pretty well.
But I think Mai should have more lines.
He is good with characters and dialog...
But he is not as good as Takagi-kun when it comes to inventing crimes.
Ordinarily, we would not do this.
Even though you are working on the manga, could you think of a crime for the drama CD?
I will think of a crime for the drama CD.
I want it to be really good!
But... do you really have time?
We are doing another series, so I have everything planned ahead.
I have got plenty of time.
Now that that series is done, should not you be going to bed earlier?
I am working on the drama CD now!
The one Miho is going to be on?
So you are writing a script for the drama CD?
I am making the actual crime parts more interesting.
You have only just noticed my talent?
The fact that you can touch type is so cool!
Kaya-chan, guess what else I can do without looking...
Are you sure this is okay?
You could use this for the manga.
We want it to be as good as possible.
When people hear it, we want them to think PCP is amazing.
That way we will be more likely to get an anime.
Well, while I am here let us talk about the next series.
Well, I will get back to my pen.
We have already done two series with Akechi,
so I wanted to do something different for this one.
Wait, you have already got another idea?
Um, will Takagi-sensei be here tomorrow?
I want to have him look at my storyboard.
But it is not done yet...
I am the only person not working on something!
Then I will come over now!
Rabuta does not trust people anymore.
And Peace can read people's feelings.
I love dogs so I thought that would be a good subject to write about.
His nose can tell the difference between good and bad people.
And he can hear when people are not being honest.
And when he licks someone, they tell the truth.
But right now, it seems like the dog is the hero.
In order to be more suited for Jack, you need to make the hero stronger.
It is a good idea, so revise it a bit and we will show it to Hattori-san.
I want to get your okay first, Takagi-sensei.
Takagi-san, if I ever draw something, please look at it too!
In addition to the drama CD, PCP is getting a novelization!
Tanabe Ikki-san will be writing it.
Of all the light-novel authors, he is the best for mysteries.
Oh, I have heard of him.
Of course, we will have you check his work.
A drama CD... and a novel.
I need to make it clear.
PCP will not get an anime.
Maybe I should say it is best to assume that it will not.
We have a drama CD and a novel, why not an anime?
The drama CD and novel are different.
An anime is a big project.
You cannot do it without a sponsor.
PCP will not get a sponsor very easily.
We even saw kids playing it in the park!
I have not shown you, but there are a lot of protest letters, too.
Children like to imitate the story.
Parents do not want their kids imitating crimes and pranks.
You have not had them do anything actually harmful, but people do not understand.
It is not like a battle manga.
You can actually do the stuff from the story.
But that difference is what makes it popular!
It is realistic and totally possible.
But for an anime, that would be a big flaw.
Then, we can change the nature of the crimes.
Make them only do good things?
That is what makes it interesting.
We cannot afford to change that.
PCP is the perfect Ashirogi Muto manga.
Takagi-kun, you have not done anything wrong with the story.
But if we cannot get an anime...
Why are you so fixed on that?
It is popular, is not that good enough?
If you do not get an anime, would you feel like you have failed?
An anime is something that comes afterward.
It is not something you plan for.
An anime... making a story that is good enough.
Every since middle school, when we teamed up!
We both want to see our manga become an anime.
That is always been our goal!
Takagi-kun, you are the type to plan things out.
You have planned a lot for PCP.
But if you really want an anime,
you need to consider that in your planning too!
I did not include that in my plans.
I did not think about it.
That is why it is good!
You never would have come up with this manga if you had planned for an anime.
But now that you have said this,
next time I am going to plan for an anime from the start!
We should focus our effort on it.
I guess I am a little shocked.
I was not thinking about it at all.
PCP owes its popularity to you!
Have you asked Azuki when she wants to get married?
There is a big difference between 22 and 30.
We do not know how long PCP will run.
You do not need to worry about that!
Azuki-san, when do you want to get married ideally?
It is not something I need to worry about.
But we have not beaten Crow yet.
But he does Crow by himself.
If Shujin and I both worked on it...
A second series might put us ahead of Eiji.
Like Shujin said, if we specifically make it to be an anime...
We do both have a little more free time now.
I should not tell Shujin something like that.
We need to focus on PCP.
I was the one who said we were only 20.
We should see how things go, and then...
So right here is the focal point.
You want a big full-page panel for that.
That is about all I can help with.
Shujin does seem to have more free time.
It will not be long now.
Before you head home, you can work on what I mentioned.
Want to have him look at it?
Showing his storyboard to an editor...
You guys are all working hard!
Moriya-kun, let me have a look at yours.
What do you think of my work?
Most importantly, it is difficult to understand.
Why do the humans help the city grow?
They do not have a reason.
Readers do not want to be preached at.
Let us move on to Shiratori-kun.
You could submit this to Treasure... no, even Next.
Or is it too early for that?
I do not want to submit this.
This is good enough to get serialized.
Yeah, this is a good chance!
This storyboard is not really mine.
Before I showed it to you,
Takagi-sensei looked at it and I revised it three times.
Yeah, he asked me to look at it.
I thought it might be too good for a first try.
Do you still have your original storyboard?
I want to show this to my superiors.
Idea and art by Shiratori Shun
Story by Ashirogi... no, Takagi Akito.
If it got serialized, it would be best to have Takagi-kun write the story.
If Shujin starts working on another series...
Takagi-kun, you have just gotten used to writing PCP.
So it would not be right away, but would you think about it?
That would be Mashiro's decision too.
As long as it does not interfere with PCP...
When I struggle toward my dream
Those are the moments I love the most
I can feel our bond and will to fight
Our views overlap and electrify us
Let us improve ourselves, become what we should be
You can see the future in our path
My comrades do not agree with me
I cannot let it go, I will follow my heart from now on
There is no other choice, this is what I love and this is what I will do
I do not know what tomorrow will bring
But I know once again (just to get by),
If I do my best, can I fulfill my dreams too?
Do not turn away from your true self.
I cannot give up on my dream!
